brand_identity.name: RoadSentinel AI
brand_identity.visual_style: Dark Mode Surveillance, High Contrast, Data-Dense

typography.installation: Import Google Fonts: Chivo (400, 700, 900), Inter (variable), JetBrains Mono (variable)

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use 'bg-slate-950' for main app background. Use 'bg-slate-900/50' with 'backdrop-blur-sm' for panels.
usage_rules.borders: Use 'border-slate-800' for structural borders. Use 'border-cyan-500/30' for active elements.
usage_rules.gradients: Avoid full gradients. Use subtle radial gradients 'bg-gradient-radial' for 'glow' effects behind key metrics.
usage_rules.shadows: Use 'shadow-lg' or 'shadow-cyan-900/20' for elevation. No soft gray shadows.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-400 text-slate-950 font-bold rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wide text-xs h-9 px-4 transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,211,238,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 border border-slate-700 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wide text-xs h-9 px-4
buttons.destructive: bg-red-900/50 border border-red-500/50 text-red-200 hover:bg-red-900/80 rounded-sm

cards.base: bg-slate-900/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-slate-800 rounded-md overflow-hidden

inputs.base: bg-slate-950 border border-slate-800 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 rounded-sm text-sm placeholder:text-slate-600

visual_enhancers.tech_lines: Add 1px border lines to separate sections, reminiscent of HUD interfaces.
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: Overlay a subtle repeating linear gradient to simulate CRT scanlines on video feeds: 'bg-[linear-gradient(rgba(18,16,16,0)_50%,rgba(0,0,0,0.25)_50%),linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,0,0,0.06),rgba(0,255,0,0.02),rgba(0,0,255,0.06))]' (use sparingly or just a simple repeating-linear-gradient).

libraries.maps: react-map-gl (Mapbox) or leaflet (react-leaflet). Prefer Leaflet for simplicity if no API key.
libraries.icons: lucide-react (AlertTriangle, Activity, Camera, MapPin, LayoutDashboard, History, Settings)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT DARK MODE ONLY. This is a surveillance tool. Do not create a light mode toggle.
2. THEME: 'Tactical HUD'. Use sharp corners (rounded-sm or rounded-md), no rounded-full buttons.
3. VIDEO GRID: This is the core feature. Create a 'Grid' component that can handle dynamic number of feeds (1x1, 2x2, 3x3).
4. MAP: Use a dark tile layer for the map (e.g., CartoDB Dark Matter).
5. ALERTS: Critical alerts (Potholes) must 'pop' with Red accents. Info alerts (Billboards) should be Cyan.
6. PLACEHOLDERS: Use the provided Unsplash images to simulate camera feeds if no real stream is available. Overlay 'CAM-01', 'LIVE', 'REC' text on them.
7. FONT: Import 'Chivo' and 'JetBrains Mono' in index.css using @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@400;700;900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap');
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use generic 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid deep slate colors.
Do not ask clarifying questions. Make executive design decisions based on this file.
